metadata.description: Build an XOR gate using AND, OR, and NOT gates. The output should be HIGH only when exactly one input is HIGH.
metadata.successCriteria: The LED should light up only when exactly one of the inputs is on.
hints: Remember that XOR means 'exclusive OR' - it's true when either but not both inputs are true
You can build an XOR using AND, OR, and NOT gates
A common pattern is: (A AND (NOT B)) OR ((NOT A) AND B)
